title: Was Donald Trump’s Mother an Undocumented Immigrant?
subtitle: Though her citizenship status was apparently incorrectly documented in the 1940 United States census, no evidence suggests Donald Trump's mother was ever in violation of any immigration laws prior to her naturalization in 1942.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Mary Anne MacLeod, President Donald Trump’s mother, illegally immigrated to the United States in 1929.
